mema kandulawa madiriya rajamaha wiharasthanaye ihatha mahanahimi wadasiti athara henawa shri dhammarakkhithabhidhana nayakahimi saha kanawa shri sudassi nahimi yana dedena kalugalin aawasayak karawu bawa unwahansela prakashakara atha.danthure rajamaha wiharadhipathi henawa dhammarakkhithabhidhana ihala dolospaththuwe pradhana adhikarana sanghanayaka padawiya kurunagala disthrikkayata unwahanseta labadunne kandulawa wiharadhipathi nisaya.unwahansege nayaka padawi sannase eya dakwa thibe.matha kalayedi unwahansegekandulawa shriaththadassi nahimiyo wada wasaya kara athi athara unwahanseta sthira shishyayek nowiya.unwahanseta upasthana kala kandulawa wanarathana nam bhikshuwa ema kandulawa game upan nisa game kamata wadasiti athara unwahansege upasampadawa dehelgamuwe hamuduruwo, thalgodapitiye hamuduruwo, kumbaukwawe hamuduruwo yana ayage namata malwathu parshawaye upasampada karawa pasuwa wiharasthanaya hodin rakabala gath athara unwahanse kala waradi kriya nisa dayaka pirisa palawa dama atha.pasuwa wanarathana himi madawala pansale hamuduruwanta bharadun athara unwahanse watina badumuttu madawala asgiriye pansalata genagos atha.pasuwaunwahanseta ayithi nathi nisa danagena wiharasthanayen gos atha.pasuwa waswasima pinisa udurawana somarathana nayaka himiyan was wasa atha.
